item.title: My First Post
item.description: Welcome to my blog! This is my first post, and I'm excited to share my thoughts and experiences with you.

item.title: Make simple calculations in Django forms using django-calculation
item.description: Make simple calculations in your Django forms using django-calculation.

item.title: Automatically convert a website to dark mode
item.description: A few days ago I had the need to apply the dark mode to a website and I didn't want to spend a lot of time in the conversion process, so I started looking for a utility to facilitate the process, luckily I found Darkreader.

item.title: Markdown test
item.description: This is a test blog entry to verify the generation of HTML from Markdown for all the entries on my blog.
